QuestionText: Find the mass of the atmosphere.
At approximately what height above sea level does half of the mass of the atmosphere lie above and other half lie below? Assume $H=8$km and neglect the small vertical variation of $g$ with height.

Assume exponential pressure and dnesity dependence with scale height $7.5$km. Estimate the heights of the atmosphere at which \\(a) the ar density is equal to $1kgm^{-3}$\\(b)the height at which the pressure is equal to $1$hPa.
